short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser plugin to provide extended features for websites that are running the Xenforo forums software

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Members of websites that use the Xenforo software can add the usernames of other members who they wish to ignore. Any content from those users will be hidden on the page.

Alternatively, usernames can be added to a list of approved users and then only content from those users will be visible.
